tgt_original: tad eva bhagavān āha- sevākāle mahoṣṇīṣaṁ bimbaṁ vibhāvya yatnataḥ |
ākāśe dharmodaye cittavajraṁ pratiṣthāpya sevākāle prathamakāle pratyāhāreṇa bhāvayed dhyānāṅgena sthirīkuryād ity atra bhagavataḥ pratijñā-
yadi na syāt pratyayas tatra tadā me tanmṛṣā vacaḥ ||  iti |
atra pratyayo dhūmādikaṁ nimittaṁ nānyan mantrādikaṁ dinenaikena sādhyate yena pratyayo bhaviṣyati mantriṇām |
atra saṁdhyābhāṣāntareṇoṣṇīṣabimbaṁ buddhabimbaṁ tra- idhātukam aśeṣataḥ |
